desc: Fergon Iron Restore is a great-tasting, chewable tablet that's gentle on the stomach and easy to incorporate into your diet and lifestyle. It has great, natural orange flavor in a chewable tablet, which is non-constipating and gentle on the stomach. It is also gluten-free and suitable for vegetarians.

layout.text: Fergon® Iron Restore™ is the gentle iron supplement that’s easy on your digestive system. Delicious orange chewable tablets you can take on an empty stomach—naturally-flavored with no metallic aftertaste. Vegan and non-constipating, with 27mg of iron per tablet.
